snippet: Investigators were seeking a sixth girl in connection with the assault at a McDonald’s on Flatbush Avenue on Monday.
abstract: Teenage girls Aniah Ferguson, Tilani Marshall, Mercedes Wilkinson and two others are arrested on charges of gang assault and robbery of 15-year-old Ariana Taylor in McDonald's in Flatbush neighborhood of Brooklyn; assault, captured on cellphone video, has drawn widespread attention and ire.
lead_paragraph: Investigators were seeking a sixth girl in connection with the assault at a McDonald’s on Flatbush Avenue on Monday.

headline.main: 5 Teenagers in Custody After Attack on Another Girl in Brooklyn
headline.print_headline: 5 Teenagers in Custody After Attack on Another in Brooklyn
